manzils.text: Alo, wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt tuuwibt
Day d lwehma, i medden, ma Nweeea n i urgaz nnsen: "nabi imdanen, becceo wid iumnen ar ad afen arraz umain ar Mass nnsen"? Nnan ijehliyen: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear n uuee

Ih, Mass nnwen d Oebbi, i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan. Sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld, Iseyyi lameo. Ur illi umcafaa siwa ma Iaammed as. D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP. Day ur d tesmektayem ara
£uoeS akw tu$alin nnwen. Lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Ih, Inezzu axlaq, Ippales, iwakken ad Ikafi wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, s lmizan. I wid ijehlen, tissit io$an, aaaqeb aqeoean, imi llan jehlen
D Neppa i Irran iiij d lefnao, aggur d tafat. Iwezn as tiswaain, iwakken a ppissinem amvan iseggwasen, akked leesab. Ur Ixliq Oebbi ayagi, siwa s tidep. Ipfeuuil issekniyen i ugdud issnen
S tidep, di lemgarda ger yiv akked wass, akked wayen Ixleq Oebbi di tmurt akked igenwan, ard issekniyen i ugdud i ipeezziben
Ih, wid ur negguni ara timlilit yidne£, i tqennaa tmeddurt di ddunit, u rekden degs, d wid i istehzan $ef issekniyen nne£
Wigi, axxam nnsen di tmes, ilmend n wayen keppben
Ih, wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Inhu Mass nnsen, s liman nnsen. Ad ppazzalen isaffen seddawat sen, di leonanat isaadiyen
Anuju nnsen degs: "gedha s yissek a Oebbi"! Azul nnsen d: "tifrat". Anuju nnsen aneggaru: "ccekoan i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Lemmer ad Iaaoel Oebbi cceoo ar imdanen, akken nitni earen $ef lxio, yili ibbwev asen lajel nnsen. A Nanef i wid ur negguni ara timlilit yidne£, ad ddebdben di lbe$wv nnsen
Amdan, ma ieuza t ccqa, ad a£ £ d isiwel, ieeel, iqqim ne$ ibedd. Mi s Nekkes ccqa s, ad iteddu amzun ur d inuj $uone£ilmend n ccqa i t ieuzan. Akka ay ppucebeen igiten nnsen i imaafan
Ni$ Nesqucc isuta, uqbel nnwen, imi densen. Ussan d $uosen imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, ur llin d wid ara iamnen. Akka ay Nepqeiii agdud ibe$wviyen
Sinna, Nerra kwen d igensas di tmurt, deffir sen, a Nwali amek ara txedmem

Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, wid ur negguni ara timlilit yidne£, ad inin: "awi d Leqwoan nniven, ne$ beddel it". Ini: "ur felli a t beddle$, s leb$i n yiman iw. Teddu$ kan akked wayen iyi d ippuweeean. Nek ugade$, ma xedaa$ Mass iw, aaaqeb n wass ameqwoaean
Ini: "lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur awen t id mli$, ur awen t id mmekti$. Ni$ zed$e$ yidwen tameddurt, uqbel is. Day ur tfehmem ara
Anwa i idensen kteo, ger win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ win inekoen issekniyen iS? Ih, ur rebeen ibe$wviyen

La aabden, war Oebbi, ayen ur ten neiiuou, ur ten nenfaa. La qqaoen: "wigi d imcafaen nne$ ar Oebbi". Ini: "day a pxebboem Oebbi $ef wayen ur Issin, di tmurt akked igenwan"? Gedha s yiS! I Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Llan imdanen d yiwen n lois kan. Sinna, mgaraden. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal, s$uo Mass ik, ad yili ueuddu, garasen, $ef wayen i$ef mgaraden
La qqaoen: "a lemmer id irs $uoes ussekni n Mass is"! Ini: "tabavnit ar Oebbi kan. Ihi, gganit. Nek, yidwen, seg wid iggunin
Ma Neseess i imdanen aeunu, deffir twa$it i ten ieuzan, atnan la ppandin i issekniyen nne£. Ini: "Oebbi Yif akw akken Ip$awal di tieeoci". Imersulen nne£, s tidep, pparun ayen teppandim

Neppa i kwen Ippawin di lberr, di yill. Alamma, mi tellam di lembwabeo, teppedum degsen s wavu uuwib, feoeen yis, tusa d tbucivant $uosen, ppasent ed lemwao $uosen, si yal tama, eulfan a d tezzi fellasen. Naaoen Oebbi, s lqaaida i Neppa: "ma Tsellkev a$ si tagi, ar a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Mi ten Isellek, imiren u$alen be$wven di tmurt, war ssebba. A yimdanen! Lbe$wv nnwen, siwa $ef yiman nnwen. Zzhu di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, $uone£ tu$alin nnwen, ad awen Nmel ayen txeddmem

Amedya n tmeddurt di ddunit, am aman kan. Nesse$li ten id seg igenni, xelven akked im$an n tmurt, iseg teppen imdanen akked lmal. Mi tcebbee tmurt, tu$al d tuzyint, $ilen, imezda$ is, ar deg ufus nnsen ay tella. Iusa p id lameo nne£, deg iv, ne$ deg wass, Nerra p d ahicuo, amzun ur teoouoeg ass izeryen. Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen i ugdud ipxemmimen
Inecced Oebbi s axxam n tifrat. Inehhu win i S ihwan, ar ubrid uwqim
I wid iweqmen, lewqama, ternuv as. Udmawen nnsen, ur ten ipnal bufsus, ne$ ddell. Widak, d at Loennet, nitni, degs ad wekkoen
Aqeiii n wid id ibbwin tucmitin, d tucmip itent icban. Ad ndellen. Ur saun ameneul ar Oebbi. Amzun $ummen wudmawen nnsen, s ccevyat n yiv iberkanen. Widak d at tmes, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen
Ass ideg ara ten Nfesser akw, a Nini, imiren, i wid icurken: "imukan nnwen, kunwi akked icriken nnwen"! Sinna Nessemfaoaq iten. A d inin, icriken nnsen: "macci d nekwni ay taabdem
Ad Iqadd Oebbi, d Anagi garane$ yidwen, ar ur d neclia deg uabbed nnwen
Din, yal amdan ad iwali ayen iwasa. Ad u$alen ar Oebbi, Bab nnsen n tidep. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

Ini: "anwa ikwen Ip$itin seg igenni akked tmurt? Anwa ay d Bab n tmejjin akked yieoi? Anwa id Issuffu$en amuddir si lmegget, id Issuffu$en lmegget seg umuddir? Anwa i Iseyyin lameo"? A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepeezzibem ara
D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen n tidep. Deffir tidep, acu i illan, siwa ttelfan? Ihi, acimi texdaam
Akka i iuao wawal n Mass ik, $ef wid ixedmen tucmitin. Ih, nitni ur ppamnen
Ini: "day illa ger icriken nnwen, win id inzan lxelq, sinna, iules as d"? Ini: "Oebbi inezzu lxelq, sinna, Ippales as d. Ihi, amek ara twexxoem

Ini: "day illa, ger icriken nnwen, win i inehhun ar tidep"? Ini: "Oebbi Inehhu ar tidep. Win Inehhun ar tidep, day ur Yif ara, akken Iklal tikli yideS, win ur nennehhu, siwa ma ipwanha? Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepseyyim
Tegwti, segsen, teddun kan d nnwaya. Nnwaya, war ccekk, ur tebbwi acemma si tidep. Ih, Oebbi Issen acu xeddmen
Leqwoan agi ur d innulfa ara, war Oebbi. Maca, d atebbet n wayen it id izwaren, d afeuuel n Tezmamt, ur degs ccekk, s$uo Mass imavalen
Ne$ la qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "awit ed tasuoep i t icban, neccdet seg wanda tzemrem, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii, skaddben ayen ur nekcim di tmusni nnsen, ur ten id iusi usefhem is. Akka ay skaddben, wid i ten id izwaren. Wali, ihi, amek tevoa d imednas
Garasen, wid iumnen yis; garasen, wid ur numin yis. Mass ik Yif akw akken Issen ifessaden
Ma skaddben k, ini: "i nek igiten iw, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Ur teppkam deg wayen xedme$, ur ppka$ deg wayen txedmem
Garasen, llan wid i k issemeasen. Day tzemrev a pperrev ad slen iaeeeugen, ma llan ur fehhmen
Garasen, llan wid i k ipmuqulen. Day tzemrev a ppenhuv ider$alen, ma llan ur pwalin
Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iddennis imdanen, s wacemma, maca imdanen densen iman nnsen
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, amzun saaddan kan saaa n wass, ad msaaqalen. Ni$ xesoen wid iskaddben timlilit d Oebbi. Ur pwanhan
Ad ak Nessken kra seg wayen i sen Naahed, ne$ a k id Nawi $uone£. Ihi, $uone£ tu$alin nnsen. Sinna, Oebbi d Anagi n wayen xeddmen
I yal lois, amazan. Ma iusa d umazan nnsen, a ppefru garasen s lmizan, ur pwadensen
Qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "ur mlike$ i iman iw vveoo, ne$ aba$uo, siwa ayen Ib$a Oebbi. Yal lois s lajel is". Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen s saaa, ur t id sseqoaben
Ini: "acu twalam, ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb iS, deg iv, ne$ deg wass? Acimi earen $uoeS ibe$wviyen
D$a, ma iusa d, a ppamnem yis? Tura, aql akwen t$eubem fellas
Sinna, ad asen inin i wid idensen: "jeoobet aaaqeb n lebda. Ma teppuqeiian siwa kan $ef wayen tkeppbem
Steqsayen k: "d tidep ayagi"? Ini: "ih, s Mass iw, ar ayagi d tidep! Kunwi ur tezmirem i usfunneg
Xas ad isau, yal amdan idensen, i illan di tmurt, ur d ifeddu yis. Ffren nndama mi walan aaaqeb. Aeuddu garasen, s lmizan, ur pwadensen
Day, s tidep, macci n Oebbi i illan di tmurt akked igenwan? Ih, day lemaahda n Oebbi macci d tidep? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen
Neppa Issidir, Ineqq. £uoeS ara tu$alem
A yimdanen! Ni$ iusa kwen id unabi s$uo Mass nnwen, akked ccfa n wayen iblan ulawen, akked nnhaya, akked ueunu i lmumnin
Ini: "s lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S, s waya, xas ad feoeen". Yif ayen pkemmimen
Ini: "twalam ayen i wen d Issers Oebbi n ooeeq? Terram segs leelal d leeoam". Ini: "Iaammed awen Oebbi, ne$ tesnulfam d $ef Oebbi
Acu ara meyyzen, ass n tnekra, wid id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi? Ih, Oebbi d Bab n lfevl af imdanen, maca tegwti segsen ur snemmiren

Ur teppiliv di lieala, ur temmalev si Leqwoan, ur tepce$wilem di kra, mebla ma Nella d Inagan nnwen, mara tweqmem. Lmizan ubelkim di tmurt u deg igenni, ur idrig i Mass ik. Akken seddaw waya, ne$ sennig es. Akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ih, s tidep, iebiben n Oebbi ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iumnen u llan eezzben
a ten beccoen s lxio di tmeddurt n ddunit, di laxeot. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawalen n Oebbi. D wagi ay d rrbee ameqwoaean
Ur k i$webbel wawal nnsen. Ih, tazmert akw n Oebbi. Neppa Isell, d Amusnaw
S tidep, day macci n Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt? D acu iiafaoen wid ipnujun, war Oebbi, ar icriken? Iiafaoen kan nnwaya. Oaaalen kan
Neppa, i wen Irran iv i ureyyee nnwen, ass iwakken a pwalim. Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i ugdud isellen
Nnan: "Oebbi Isaa aqcic. Gedha s yiS! Neppa d Ameokanti. IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ur tesaim adabu $ef waya. Day a d tinim $ef Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Ini: "s tidep, wid id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ur rebeen
Zzhu di ddunit, sinna, $uone£ tu$alin nnsen. D$a, ad asen Nsaaddi aaaqeb uqsie, imi llan jehlen

Eeku yasen d tadyant n Nue, mi inna i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Ma eeayit fellawen tilin iw, akked usmekti w n issekniyen n Oebbi, $ef Oebbi ppekle$, ihi, zduklet lameo nnwen akked icriken nnwen. Sinna, ur awen teppili lhejna $ef lameo nnwen, d$a, frut ep felli, ur iyi sganit
Ma twexxoem, ur awen ssuture$ taqdiat. Ih, taqdiat iw ar Oebbi kan. Felli lameo ad ili$ seg imvuaen
Skaddben t. Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo. Nerra ten d igensas. Ne$meq wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Wali amek tevoa d wid ippunedoen
Sinna, deffir es, Nuzen ed imazanen ar igduden nnsen. Usan ten id s ubeggen. Ur ssawven ad amnen $ef wayen nekoen zik. Akka ay Nselle$ ulawen ixabiten
Sinna, deffir sen, Nuzen ed Musa akked Haoun, ar Feraun akked imvebboen is, s issekniyen nne£. Sme$woen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi ten id tusa tidep, s$uone£, nnan: "wagi, ih, d sseur n uuee
Inna Musa: "day a tinim d sseur wagi, i tidep mi kwen id tusa"? Ur rebeen iseeearen
Nnan: "day d tusiv $uone$, ad a$ tesiixxoev seg wayen id nufa ar imezwura nne$, a ppu$alem, di sin, d imeqwoanen di tmurt? Ur numin, nekwni, yiswen
Inna Feraun: "awit iyi d yal aseeear amusnaw
Mi d usan iseeearen, inna yasen Musa: "veggoet ara tveggoem
Mi veggoen, inna Musa: "ayen d tebbwim d sseur. S tidep, a t Inqev Oebbi". Ih, Oebbi ur Issewqam ara igiten ifessaden
Oebbi Itebbit tidep, s wawal iS, xas ugin ibe$wviyen
I iumnen s Musa, siwa tarwa seg ugdud is, ilmend n tugdi uhewwel n Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ih, Feraun d abe$wvi di tmurt. Neppa, s tidep, seg imaafan
Inna Musa: "a yagdud iw! Ma teppamnem s Oebbi, ppeklet fellaS ma d imvuaen ay tellam
Nnan: "neppkel $ef Oebbi. A Mass nne$, ur a$ ppara d ahewwel i ugdud imednas
Sellek a$, s ueunu K, seg ugdud ijehliyen
Nweeea i Musa akked gma s: "ebnut ixxamen i ugdud nnwen di Maueo, erret ixxamen nnwen ar lqibla, beddet i teallit. Becceo lmumnin

Inna Musa: "a Mass nne$! S tidep, Tefkiv i Feraun akked imvebboen is, ooeue akked wayla di tmeddurt n ddunit, a Mass nne$, iwakken ad nnetlafen seg ubrid iK. A Mass nne$, Squcc ayla nnsen, S$eo ulawen nnsen, ur ppamnen alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
Inna: "ih, tepwaqbel tnaaoit nnwen. Ddut di lewqam, ur teddut d ubrid n wid ur nessin
Nezzger At Isoail di yill. Vefoen ten Feraun akked iasekoiwen is, s leb$wev d lewaaoa. Armi ibbwev ad i$meq, inna: "umne$! Ih, ur illi oebbi siwa Win is umnen At Isoail. Nek seg imvuaen
Tura! Ni$ zik taauav, telliv seg ifessaden
Assa, a Nsellek loeppa k, a d tegwri d assekni i wid ara k id ineufen. Aias n medden, s tidep, stehzan deg issekniyen nne£
Ni$ Nessers At Isoail deg umkan umain, u N$at iten s wayen ilhan. Ur mgaraden armi ten id tusa tussna. Ih, Mass ik ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, ilmend n wayen i$ef llan mgaraden
Ma tcukkev $ef wayen i k ed Nessers, steqsi wid i iqqaoen Tazmamt, uqbel ik. Ni$ tusa k id tidep, s$uo Mass ik, ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun
Ur ppili seg wid i iskaddben issekniyen n Oebbi, a ppiliv seg imexsuoen
Ih, wid i$ef iuao Wawal n Mass ik, ur ppamnen
xas usan ten id akw issekniyen, alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
A lemmer telli temdint iumnen, u infaa p liman is, siwa agdud n Yunes! Mi umnen, Nveooef segsen aaaqeb imdelli di tmeddurt n ddunit. Neooa ten zzhan tallit kan
Ma ihwa yaS i Mass ik, ad amnen wid illan di ddunit, akken ma llan. Day a peeppmev, kecc, i imdanen ad amnen
Ur ippamen umdan siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Isdullu wid ur nfehhem ara
Ini: "walit i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ula iwumi issekniyen akked ineddioen, i ugdud ur neppamen
Day a pganin kan amedya n wussan n wid i ten id izwaren? Ini: "gganit, nek yidwen, seg wid ipganin
Sinna, a Nsellek imazanen nne£, akked wid iumnen. Akka ay d lwajeb fella£, a Nsellek lmumnin
Ini: "a yimdanen! Ma tcukkem di ddin iw, nek ur aabde$ wid taabdem, war Oebbi. Maca, aabde$ Oebbi ara Idmen leowae nnwen. Pwamoe$ ad ili$ si lmumnin
Sbedd udem ik i ddin, s umili ar tidep, ur ppili seg imcurak
Ur pnuju, war Oebbi, ar wayen ur k inefaan, ur k iiiuooun. Ma txedmev akken, kecc, imiren, a ppiliv seg imednas
Ma Isaadda fellak Oebbi ccqa, ur ak illi ujebbao siwa Neppa. Ma Irad ak lxio, ur illi usebiiel i lfevl iS. Ippak it i win i S ihwan, deg ixdimen iS. Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ini: "a yimdanen! Ni$ tusa kwen id tidep s$uo Mass nnwen! Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is; win innetlafen, innetlef kan i iman is. Ur lli$, nek, d awkil nnwen
Ddu d wayen ik ed ippuweeean, eubeo ard Ieudd Oebbi. Neppa, Yif akw imeaddan
Alo. Tazmamt, issekniyen iS ppuuewwben, sinna, ppufeuulen s$uo Uuwib i Ipwaxebboen
Ur aabdet siwa Oebbi. Nek, s$uoeS $uowen, d aneddao u d abcir
Ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen, steooaet aS, ad Ifeooeo fellawen afeooeo ilhan, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ippak lfevl iS i yal bab n lfevl. Ma twexxoem, nekk ugade$ a ppeppuaqbem, ass ameqwran
Tu$alin nnwen, ar Oebbi. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Day nitni, s tidep, ur snefvasen ara idmaren nnsen, iwakken ad ffren fellaS? Xas $ummen s iceiiiven nnsen, day ur Ieoa ara ayen teffren akked wayen d qqaoen? Neppa, s tidep, Issen i illan deg idmaren
Ur illi lweec di tmurt, mebla ma illa ooeeq is ar Oebbi. Issen tanezdu$t is, tanielt is. Meooa, di Tezmamt ipbegginen

D Neppa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan. Asgeld iS illa $ef waman. A kwen Ijeooeb anwi segwen ara ixedmen ayen ilhan, sennig wiyav. Ma tenniv: "ih, kunwi a d tekkrem deffir tmeppant nnwen", wid ijehlen, war ccekk, a d inin: "ayagi, kan, d sseur n uuee
Ma Neswexxeo asen aaaqeb ar imir ipwassnen, war ccekk, a d inin: "d acu iT iiifen"? Ass ideg ara ten id iawev, day illa wa ara ten iveoofen segs? Ad asen izzi wayen i$ef pmmaaliken
Ma Neseess i umdan aeunu nne¨£, sinna, Nekkes as t, atan ad iayes, ad ijhel
Ma Neseess as l$it, deffir twa$it i t innulen, atan ad yini: "fukkent felli lemeayen", d$a, neppa, ad ifoee, ad izux
Kkes ed wid iuebboen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. I widak ssmae akked tikci meqqwoen
Ahat teppaoav kra n wayen ik ed ippuweeean. Pzemmiven yis idmaren ik mara qqaoen: "a lemmer i s d irs ugerruj, ne$ idda d, yides, lmelk"! Kecc d aneddao kan. Oebbi d Awkil n yal cci
Ne$ ad inin: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "awit ed, s usnulfu, mraw n tsuotin am neppa. Naaoet ayen iwumi tzemrem, war Oebbi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma ur awen d rran ara, cfut ar irs ed kan s tussna n Oebbi, ar ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Ihi, ma kunwi d imvuaen
I wid ib$an tameddurt n ddunit akked ooeue is, a Nkafi, degs, igiten nnsen, ur asen Ntekkes
Widak, ur ppafen, di laxeot, siwa times. Ad i$li wayen uenaen degs; inqev wayen xeddmen

Day win iddan d ubeggen, s$uo Mass is, u immal as t unagi s$uoeS…? U, uqbel is, Tazmamt n Musa, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Wigi umnen yis. Win i p inekoen, seg ikubar, ppaaud is d times. Ur ppili di ccekk fellas. Neppa, ih, d tidep s$uo Mass ik. Maca, tegwti n medden ur ppamnen
Anwa idensen sennig win id isnulfan tikerkas $ef Oebbi? Wigi a d rsen i Mass nnsen. A d inin inagan: "d wigi i iskaddben $ef Mass nnsen". Day Oebbi ur Ixezzu yara imednas
I isiixxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi, i t issarmen d uawij, nitni ur uminen s laxeot
Wigi, ur sfunnugen di tmurt, ur asen illi bab, war Oebbi. Fellasen aaaqeb ar wayev. Ur zmiren ad slen, ur pwalin
D wigi i isxesoen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Ur illi ccekk, ih, nitni ad xesoen, di laxeot, sennig wiyav
Ih, wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, u unzen aS i Mass nnsen, widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen
Amedya n snat n trebbuyaa am uder$al, uaeeug, akked win ipwalin, win isellen. Day aadlen sin imedyaten agi? Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is: "nek d aneddao nnwen ipbegginen
iwakken ur taabdem siwa Oebbi. Nek ugaded aaaqeb fellawen, ass aqeohan
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen, seg ugdud is: "kecc, $uone$, d amdan am nekwni. Nwala, d oodiyen nne$, kan, war ameyyez, i k ivefoen. Ur nwala s wacu i $ tifem. Xaii, neesb ikwen d ikeddaben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? Ifka yi d aeunu s$uoeS. Idreg fellawen. Day a t neeppem fellawen, ma kunwi tugim t
A yagdud iw! Ur awen ssuture$ ayla, ilmend is; taqdiat iw ar Oebbi kan. Ur ppara$, nek, wid iumnen. S tidep, ad mlilen d Mass nnsen. Maca, nek wala$ kwen d agdud ur nessin
A yagdud iw! Acu ara yi isellken seg ufus n Oebbi, lemmer i ten rri$ akin, day ur d tesmektayem ara

Ur awen qqaoe$: $uoi lexzayen n Oebbi. Ur ssine$ tabavnit. Ur qqaoe$: nek d lmelk. Ur qqaoe$ i wid eeqoent wallen nnwen: ur asen Ippak ara Oebbi lxio, d awez$i. Yif akw Oebbi akken Ieoa, i illan deg iman nnsen. Mulac ad ili$ seg imednas
Nnan: "a Nue! Ni$ tnamrev a$, tessugtev a$ anamer. Ihi, awi ya$ d ayen i $ taahdev, ma tessawalev tidep
Inna: "d Oebbi kan ar awen t id Iawin, ma ihwa yaS. Kunwi ur tesfunnugem
Xas b$i$ a kwen neuee$, ur tesfaydayam seg wanuae iw, ma Ib$a Oebbi a kwen Itlef. Neppa d Mass nnwen; tu$alin nnwen $uoeS
Ne$ qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "ma snulfa$ t id, lbe$wv iw i yiri w. Nek, ur ppka$ di lbe$wv nnwen
Ippuweeea d i Nue: "ur ippamen yiwen, d awez$i, seg ugdud ik, siwa wid illan umnen. Ihi, ur k icqi wayen xeddmen
Eunaa lbabuo, ger wallen nne£, s uweeei nne£. Ur iyI d pmeslay $ef wid idensen, war ccekk, ad $emqen
La iuennaa lbabuo. Yal tikelt ara aaddin $uoes imvebboen n ugdud is, tkaariren fellas. Inna: "ma temmaalkem degne$, ihi, a nemmaalek degwen akken temmaalkem
Deqqal a ppeeoem, u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, ara ieaz uaaqeb imezgi
Alamma, mi d iusa lameo nne£, la pfeggiven igwefran d ihedman, Nenna: "awi degs tayuga n yal uuenf, tawacult ik - siwa wid i$ef id izwar wawal -, akked wid iumnen". Drus kan i iumnen yides
Inna: "rekbet degs, s yisem n Oebbi, acali s akked trusi s. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Icula yissen, di lemwao anect idurar. Issawel Nue i mmi s, i illan weedes: "a mmi ali d yidne$, ur teppiliv ar ijehliyen
Inna: "uuoan iw d adrar, ad iyi isellek seg waman". Inna: "assa, ulac leslak si lameo n Oebbi, siwa i win i$ef Ieun". Aaddant lemwao garasen. Iuebe ed seg wid ipwa$emqen
Nnan: "a tamurt, seblaa aman im, a yigenni euufu". Aman zzren. Iuao lameo: irs $ef Loudi. Iffe$ uberrae: akin agdud imednas
Inuj Nue ar Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Ni$ mmi n twacult iw. Ih, lemaahda K d tidep, Kecc Tifev akw imeaddan
Inna: "a Nue! Neppa, s tidep, ur illi n wacult ik. Ih, neppa ur ixdim ayen ilhan. Ihi, ur iyI d steqsay $ef wayen ur tessinev. Nek a k Ssakwaye$, ur teppiliv seg wid ur nessin
Inna: "a Mass iw! Ili di laawen iw, iwakken ur K id steqsaye$ $ef wayen ur ssine$. Ma ur iyi Tsemmeev, ur Teunev felli, ad ili$ seg imexsuoen
Nnan d: "a Nue! Ers ed s tifrat s$uone£, akked lbaoaka, fellak akw $ef leoyus i illan yidek. Kra n legyus, a ten N$it. Sinna, fellasen s$uone£, aaaqeb aqeoean
Tagi si tequivin n tbavnit, Nweeea yak tent. Ur tent tessinev, kecc, ne$ agdud ik, uqbel wagi. Ihi, eubeo, taggara, war ccekk, i wid ipeezziben
I Aad, gmat sen Hud, inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Kunwi tesnulfuyem d kan
A yagdud iw! Ur awen ssuture$ taqdiat $ef waya. Taqdiat iw ar Win kan, iyi d Ixelqen. Day ur tefhimem ara
A yagdud iw! Ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen, sinna, steooaet aS. Ad awen d Isse$li ageffur d ihedman, ad awen irnu tazmert i tezmert nnwen. Ur ppu$alet d ibe$wviyen
Nnan as: "a Hud! Ur a$ d tusid s ubeggen, ur neppaoa, nekwni, ioebbiten nne$, ilmend n wawal ik, ur numin yisek
Neqqao kan, d kra ioebbiten nne$, i k i$eoqen". Inna: "nek, Anagi w d Oebbi, u cehhdet ar ur ppka$ ara deg wayen tepcarakem
war Neppa. Ihi, andit iyi akken ma tellam, sinna ur iyi sganayet
Nek, ppekle$ af Oebbi, Mass iw u Mass nnwen. Ur illi umexluq ur Iiiif seg ixef is. Ih, Mass iw deg ubrid uwqim
Ma wexxoen, ni$ ssawve$ awen d ayen i$ef id ppuceggaa$ $uowen. A d Inuef, Mass iw, agdud war kunwi. Ur T teiiuoum s wacemma. Mass iw, s tidep, d Ameareb n yal cci
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nsellek Hud akked wid iumnen yides, s ueunu s$uone£. Nsellek iten seg uaaqeb uwaio
Akka Aad. Nekoen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, auuan imazanen iS. Ddan d lameo n yal aqehhao iggernennen
A ten ivfeo xezzu di ddunit agi, u deg wass n tnekra. Day, war ccekk, ur jhilen ara Aad, ar Mass nnsen? Day macci: "akin Aad, agdud n Hud

I Tamud, gmat sen UuUalie, inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Neppa Ixelq ikwen seg wakal, Izzde$ ikwen fellas. Ssutret aS ssmae, sinna, steooaet aS. Mass iw, s tidep, Iqeob ed, Ippara d awal
Nnan as: "a Ualie, ni$ telliv garane$, uqbel aya, d asirem nne$. Day ad a$ tekksev aabad n wayen aabden imezwura nne$? Nekwni, s tidep, aql a$ di ccekk imcebbwel, $ef wayen u$uo la $ tneccdev
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? Ifka yi d aeunu s$uoeS. Acu ara yi isellken seg ufus n Oebbi, ma aaua$ $uoeS? Iyi ternam, siwa taxessaot
A yagdud iw! Tagi d tal$wemt n Oebbi, d assekni i kunwi. Eooet ep a ppeks di tmurt n Oebbi. Ur p pjeyyifet, mulac a kwen id isami uaaqeb iqeoben
Gezmen as ivaoen. Inna: "zhut deg ixxamen nnwen, krav wussan. Apan lemaahda ur nepwankao
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nsellek Ualie akked wid iumnen yides, s ueunu s$uone£, si ddell n wass nni. Ih, Mass ik d Uohid, d Uzmir
Asu$u iwwet wid idensen, gwran d d imeslax deg ixxamen nnsen
amzun ur rbieen degsen. Day, s tidep, ur jhilen ara Tamud, ar Mass nnsen? Day macci: "akin Tamud
Ni$ usan d imceggaen nne£ ar Iboahim, s ubecceo. Nnan: "tifrat"! Inna: "tifrat"! Ur iaaiiel ara ibbwi d aajmi icwin
Mi iwala ifassen nnsen ur d eeilen ara $uoes, iseassef iten, iugad iten. Nnan: "ur ppagwad, nekwni neppuceggaa ed ar ugdud n Lui
Tameiiut is tbedd, tevua. Nbecceo ip s Iseaq, akked Yaaqub, deffir Iseaq
Tenna: "a leif iw, day a d arwe$, nek d tam$aot, u argaz agi inu, wesser? Ayagi, s tidep, d lwehma
Nnan: "day twehmev di lameo n Oebbi? Aeunu n Oebbi, akked lbaoaka S, fellawen ay at uxxam. Ih, Neppa d Amaazuz, Mucaa
Mi s tekkes tugwdi i Iboahim, u iusa t id ubecceo, inumer a£ $ef ugdud n Lui
Iboahim, s tidep, ieellem, ippanez, isteooia
A Iboahim, ur keccem deg waya. Ni$ iusa d lameo n Mass ik. Nitni, a ten id ias uaaqeb, war tifrat
Mi usan imceggaen nne£ ar Lui, innu$ben, ur isai i$il a ten ifukk. Inna: "wagi d ass uwaio

Iusa d ugdud is, zeefen d $uoes. Llan, zik, xeddmen tucmitin. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Atent an issi, nitenti zeddigit, i kunwi. Eezbet i Oebbi, ur iyi peeccimet ar inebgawen iw. Day ur illi ara, garawen, urgaz aeesbi
Nnan: "ni$ teeoiv ur nesai leeqq deg issi k. Kecc, s tidep, teeoiv d acu neb$a
Inna: "a lemmer i wen zmire$, ne$ sai$ tayep ioehden

Nnan: "a Lui, nekwni d imceggaen n Mass ik. Ur k id ppawven. Oue akked twacult ik, deg iv. Yiwen degwen ur d itezzi! Kkes ed tameiiut ik. Neppat, s tidep, a ppepwwet s wayen ara ten iwwten. Ih, ppaaud nnsen, tauebeit. Ni$ tqeob ed tuebeit
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nesredm ip. Nesse$li d fellas abruri n yieoa ibelbaven n talaxt
Pwanesxen ar Mass ik. Nitni, ur baiden i imednas
I Madian, gmat sen Cuaayeb, inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Ur ssenqaset di lkil akked lmizan. Nek, wala$ kwen teowam, u ugade$ fellawen aaaqeb, ass itezzin
A yagdud iw! Ktilet, weznet, s lewqama. Ur iiuoout imdanen deg wayla nnsen, ur pdenniset, tessefsadem di tmurt
Yif it i kunwi wayen d iqqimen i Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam. Ur lli$, nek, d ameareb nnwen
Nnan: "a Cuaayeb, day a$ umoen wawalen ik, a neoo ayen aabden imezwura nne$? Ne$ a nexdem, deg wayla nne$, ayen ur a$ nehwi? Kecc, s tidep, d uelim, d uuwib

Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam, ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? I$at iyi yis, l$it imaanen. Ur b$i$ a kwen mgirrde$, siwa $ef wayen i wen gedle$. B$i$ kan, s wayen zemre$, ad awen uegme$ tikli. Laawen iw s$uo Oebbi kan. Ppekle$ fellaS, utube$ T
A yagdud iw! Awer kwen teppara nnmara w d ibe$wviyen, a ppevou yidwen akken tevoa d ugdud n Nue, ne$ win n Hud, ne$ win n Ualie! Agdud n Lui, ur ibaad ara segwen
Ssutret ssmae i Mass nnwen, sinna, steroaet aS. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipeunu, Ipeemmil
Nnan: "a Cuaayeb, ur nefhim ara aias n wayen id tenniv. Aql a$ nwala k d uohif garane$. Lemmer macci d alag ik, war ccekk, a k neooem. Ur a$ tezmirev
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Day Oebbi, $uowen, yif iT walag iw, di tezmert? Terram T ar deffir n waarur nnwen. Mass iw, s tidep, Izzi i wayen txeddmem
A yagdud iw! Xedmet deg umekkan nnwen, nek ad xedme$. Deqqal a ppeeoem, u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, anwa ay d akeddab. Aasset, nek, yidwen, ad aasse
Mi d iusa lameo nne£, Nsellek Cuaayeb akked wid iumnen yides, s ueunu s$uone£. Asu$u iwwet wid idensen, gwran d d imeslax deg ixxamen nnsen
amzun ur rbieen degsen. Day macci: "akin Madian"! Am: "akin Tamud
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£, akked udabu n uuee
uo Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ddan d lameo n Feraun. Lameo n Feraun ur illi d uuwib
Ad izwir i ugdud is, ass n tnekra, a ten inheo ar usario n tmes. A yasario ucmit u$uo pwanehoen
A ten ivfeo xezzu di tagi, u deg wass n tnekra. A tikci tucmip ippunefken
Ayagi, si tequivin n temdinin, i k d Nessawal. Garasent tid ibedden, tid ipwamegren
Ur ten Nednis. Maca, densen iman nnsen. Ur ten nefaan s wacemma, ioebbiten nnsen i la naaoen, war Oebbi, mi d iusa lameo n Mass ik. I sen rnan, siwa ssxev
Akka tiyta n Mass ik. Mi Iwwet timdinin i idensen, s tidep, tiyta S teqoee, teqsee
Ih, deg waya, assekni i wid iugaden aaaqeb n laxeot. Ass nni, d ass unejmaa n yimdanen. Ass nni, d ass n ccada
A t Neswexxeo kan ar lajel iuran
Ass ideg ara d ias, ur d ipmeslay yiwen, siwa ma s tesrie iS. Ad ilin igeswaeen, isaadiyen
Wanag igeswaeen ad ilin di tmes, s unazaa d imeiii
ad wekkoen dinna, ayen ara dumen tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ma ur Irad ara Mass ik. Ih, Mass ik Ixeddem ayen i S ihwan
Wanag isaadiyen, di Loennet, ad wekkoen, dinna, ayen ara dumen tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ma ur Irad ara Mass ik. D tikci n war tilas
Ur k ikeccem ccekk $ef wayen aabden widak. Ayen aabden am wayen aabden imezwura nnsen, zik. War ccekk, ad asen Nefk amur nnsen, ur inqis
Ni$, s tidep, Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Mgarraden fellas. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal s$uo Mass ik, yili useyyi garasen. Haaten, ih, di ccekk imcebbwel fellas
War ccekk, akken ma llan, ad Ikafi Mass ik igiten nnsen, s lmizan. Neppa, s tidep, Issen ayen xeddmen
Ihi, ili d uwqim, akken i k ippunefk lameo, kecc akked wid isteooaen yidek. Ur be$wvet. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali ay txeddmem
Ur pqeooibet ar wid idensen, a kwen tnal tmes! Ur tesaim bab, war Oebbi, ihi, ur tepwasellkem
eeal ubee, tameddit, kra n lewqat n yiv. S tidep, ise$iyen neqqven tucmitin. Ayagi d asmekti i wid ismektayen
Eubeo! Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iveggia taqdiat n lauuam
A lemmer llan, di tsuta i kwen id izwaren, imezgiyen ineqqven asefsed di tmurt! Qlilit kan seg wid Nsellek segsen. Wid idensen ddan akked wayen i ten izhan, u$alen d ibe$wviyen
Ur Isquccu ara Mass ik timdinin, d aeerfi, ma llan imezda$ nnsent d lauuam
Lemmer i S ihwi i Mass ik, ad Irr imdanen d yiwen n lois. Zgan mgarraden
Kkes ed wid i$ef Ieun Mass ik. Ixelq iten i wayagi. Itam wawal n Mass ik: "ad Acaoe$ Loahennama, war ccekk, s leonun akked yimdanen mejmulen
Ayen akw i k ed Neeka n tmucuha imazanen, iwakken a Ntebbet ul ik, yissent. Id iusan dagi d tidep, d anabi u d asmekti i lmumnin
Ini i wid ur numin ara: "xedmet ay tzemrem, nekwni s tidep, la nxeddem
Gganit, nekwni la nepgani
N Oebbi tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. £uoeS ara u$alen akw lumuo. Ihi, aabed iT, ppkel fellaS. Ur I$effel ara Mass ik, $ef wayen txeddmem
Alo. Wigi d issekniyen n Tazmamt ipbegginen
Ih, Nessader it id d Leqwoan, s taaoabt, amar a pfehmem
Nekwni Neekku yak tiekayin igerzen mavi, deg wayen i k Nweeea di Leqwoan agi, xas telliv, uqbel is, seg wid istehzan
Mi inna Yusef i baba s: "a baba! Nek wala$ mrawyan itran, iiij, akked waggur, wala$ ten knan iyi
Inna: "a mmi! Ur eekku ayen twalav i watmaten ik, ad ak andin ticeokep. Cciian, s tidep, d acengu n uuee n umdan
Akka, a k Ifren Mass ik, u ak Isselmed asefru n temsal, u ad Itim l$it iS, i kecc akked twacult n Yaaqub, akken it Itam, zik, af lejdud ik: Iboahim akked Iseaq. Mass ik, s tidep, d Amusnaw, d Uuwib
Ni$, di Yusef akked watma s, illa ussekni i wid isteqsayen
Mi nnan: "war ccekk, ifen a$, Yusef akked gma s, akken iten ieemmel babat nne$, u nekwni d iieoma. Babat nne$, s tidep, haat di ttelfan n uuee
En$et Yusef, ne$ nfut ep si tmurt, a d ilhu degwen babat wen, sinna, a ppu$alem d imdanen ixeddmen ayen ilhan
Inna win d immeslayen, degsen: "ur neqqet Yusef, veggoet ep ar lqaaa n wannu. Ma tgam akka, a t iddem yiwen umsebrid
Nnan: "a babat nne$, acu k iu$en, ur a$ tuminev ara, $ef Yusef. Nekwni, fellas, s tidep, d unuieen
Sseddu t yidne$ azekka, ad izhu, ad iurar. Nekwni, war ccekk, a neareb fellas
Inna: "nek, s tidep, $weble$ ma tebbwim t yidwen, ugade$ a t icc lweec, kunwi testehzam degs
Nnan: "ma icca t lweec, u nekwni d iieoma, s tidep a nili d imexsuoen
Mi t bbwin, mwafaqen a t roen ar lqaaa n wannu, Nweeea yas: "ad asen temlev, s tidep, lameo agi nnsen, nitni ur eoin
U$alen d tameddit, ar babat sen, pprun
Nnan: "a babat nne$, s tidep, noue a nemzizzel, neooa Yusef ar lqecc nne$, icca t lweec. Ur a$ teppamnev, xas nenna d tidep
Bbwin d tasedrit is, degs idamen n rrya. Inna: "xaii! D iman nnwen i wen d iccacven lameo. Ilha uubeo. Anuju $eo Oebbi, mgal ayen d teekam
Usan d iminigen, uznen win id ippagwmen, issader ssvel is. Inna: "a lxio, wagi d aqcic"! Ffren t, amzun d sselaa. Oebbi Ieoa acu xeddmen
Zzenzen t, s ooxa, s kra iuuodiyen. Ur as fkin ara azal

Inna, i tmeiiut is, Umauoi i t iu$en: "eoeeb yis, amar ad a$ infaa, at nerr d mmit nne$". Akka ay Nesseqaad Yusef di tmurt, iwakken ad as Nesseefev asefru n temsal. Oebbi d Amezwaru s lameo iS, maca tegwti n medden ur eoin ara
Mi d immeetel, Nefka yas uuwab, tussna. Akka ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Teb$a t tin u$ur izde$. Terra tibbura, u tenna: "eyya kecc"! Inna: "ad iyi Ineooi Oebbi! Ni$ bab iw ioeeb yissi. S tidep, ur rebeen imednas
S tidep, teb$a t, u neppa ib$a p, lemmer ur iwala ara atebbet n Mass is. Akka, iwakken a Nessebaad fellas tuccva, laao. Neppa, s tidep, seg imdanen nne£ izedganen
Uzzlen ar tebburt, tcerreg as tasedrit is, si zdeffir. Mmugren, argaz is, ar tebburt. Tenna: "acu ay d aqeiii n win iaabwlen ad iccmet tawacult ik, siwa leebs ne$ aaaqeb aqeoean
Inna: "d neppat iyi ib$an". Icuhhed ed yiwen unagi si twacult is: "ma teqqeos tsedrit si zdat, tenna d tidep, u neppa d akeddab
Ma teqqeos tsedrit si zdeffir, teskaddeb, u neppa seg at tidep
Mi iwala teqqeos tsedrit si zdeffir, inna: "ayagi, war ccekk, si nncub nnkwent. Ih, nncub nnkwent d timeqwoaeanin
A Yusef, ppu ayagi, u kem ssuter ssmae ubekkav im. Kem, s tidep, teccvev
La qqaoent tlawin, di temdint: "tameiiut umdebbeo teemmel acrik is. Teshebl ip tayri. F akken nwala, appan, s tidep, di ttelfan n uuee

Mi tesla s nncub nnsent, tuzen $uosent, thegga yasent tanalt. I yal yiwet segsent, tefka tafrut. Tenna: "effe$ ed garasent". Mi t walant, isdehc itent, jereent ifassen nnsent, nnant: "eaca Oebbi, wagi macci d amdan, wagi siwa d lmelk ukyis
Tenna: "d wagi i$ef iyi tlummemt. Ih, b$i$ t, neppa iqqim zeddig. Ma ur ixdim ara ay s umoe$, war ccekk, ad ipwaebes, ad ipwaeqeo
Inna: "a Mass iw! Smenyafe$ leebs i wayen u$ur iyi d ssawalent. Ma ur Tesbaadev ara felli nncub nnsent, ad male$ $uosent, ad ili$ seg wid ur nessin
Ijaweb as d Mass is. Issebaad fellas nncub nnsent. Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Sinna, mi ten usan issekniyen, ufan, war ccekk, ilaq a t irr ar leebs, kra n tallit

Kecmen yides, ar leebs, sin ilmeeiyen. Inna yiwen degsen: "nek wala$ iman iw, la teeeme$ ccoab". Inna d wayev: "nek wala$ iman iw, la ppawi$ a$oum $ef uqeoou w, la teppen segs ifrax. Ssefru ya$ p id. Ih, nwala k seg iaaoviyen
Inna: "seg wayen iyi ss$eo Mass iw, ad awen p id ssefru$, uqbel a kwen id iawev lqut i wen ppakken. Nek ooi$ ddin n ugdud ur numin s Oebbi, u nitni nekoen laxeot
Ddi$ d ddin n lejdud iw: Iboahim, Iseaq akked Yaaqub. Ur a$ ippunefk a nezdukkel acemma i Oebbi. Ayagi si lfevl n Oebbi fellane$, akw $ef imdanen. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen ur snemmiren
A yimeddukwal iw n leebs, menyif imawlan imfaoaqen, ne$ Oebbi Yiwen, Aqehhao

Ay taabdem, war Neppa, d ismawen kan i sen tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen. Ur asen d Issers ara Oebbi kra udabu. Leukm ar Oebbi kan. Iumeo ed ur taabdem, siwa Neppa. D wagi ay d ddin uuwib, maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
A yimeddukwal iw n leebs, wanag yiwen degwen ad ismiri ccoab, i bab is, wayev ad ippusemmeo $ef umidag, ifrax ad nneqben aqeoou s. Ippuseyya lameo $ef wayen iyi d testeqsam
Inna i win ieua ad islek, segsen: "ar bab ik, smekti iyi d". Cciian iseppu t, ur t id ismekti ar bab is. Irna, di leebs, kra iseggwasen
Inna ugellid: "nek wala$ ua testan tiqebwaniyin, la tent teppent ua tuvaifin, akked ua tyedrin tizegzawin, tiyav d tiqquoanin. A yimvebboen, ssefrut iyi d targit, ma tellam seg wid issefruyen tirga
Nnan: "d tirga iwlellsen. Ur nelli d imusnawen i usefru n tirga
Win i isellken si sin nni, armi tallit id immekti, inna: "nek, ad awen d awi$ asefru ines, aznet iyi
A Yusef, bab n tidep, ssefru ya$ d: ua testan tiqebwaniyin, la tent teppent ua tuvaifin, akked ua tyedrin tizegzawin, tiyav d tiqquoanin. Amar, ma u$ale$ ar imdanen, amar ad eoen
Inna: "zeraat ua iseggwasen imyevfaoen. Ayen tzeraam, eooet ep di tyedrin is, siwa cwii ara teccem
Sinna, deffir sen, a d asen ua iwaaoen. Ad ccen ayen i sen theggam siwa cwii, seg wayen txeznem
Sinna a d ias, deffir waya, useggwas n tallalt i medden, ideg ara eden
Inna ugellid: "awit ep id $uoi". Mi t id iusa umersul, inna: "u$al ar bab ik, u steqsi t acu ay d l$eov n tlawin i ijereen ifassen nnsent. Mass iw, s tidep, Issen nncub nnsent
Inna: "acu ara d tinimt mi teb$amt Yusef"? Nnant: "eaca Oebbi, ur nufi $uoes tuccva". Tenna d tmeiiut umvebbeo: "tura, a d tban tidep. D nek i t ib$an, ma d neppa, s tidep, d bab n tidep
Akka, iwakken ad ieeo ur t xdiaa$ ara s tuffra. Oebbi ur Inehhu nncub n lxeyyan
Ur pzekki$ iman iw. Tanefsit, s tidep, tezzu$uo ar tuccva, siwa ma Ieun Mass iw. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Inna ugellid: "awit ep id $uoi, d laatiq iw". Mi s immeslay, inna: "kecc, assa, nefka yak adabu, laman
Inna: "wekkel iyi $ef lemxazen n tmurt, nek d ameareb amusnaw
Akka ay Nesseqaad Yusef di tmurt, ad izde$ anda i s ihwa. Nepeunu $ef win i £ ihwan, ur Nesoueu arraz iaaoviyen
S tidep, arraz n laxeot yif it, i wid iumnen u llan peezziben
Usan watmaten n Yusef, kecmen $uoes, iaqel iten, nitni ur t aqilen
Mi sen ifka ppaabgat nnsen, inna: "awit iyi d gmat wen s babat wen. Day ur twalam ara zade$ awen lkil, u, nek, ife$ akw wid isnebgaten
Ma ur iyi t id tebbwim ara, ur awen nepktili $uoi, ur iyi d tepsamim
Nnan: "a neawet baba s fellas; akka ara nexdem
Inna i iqeddacen is: "rret selaa nnsen deg icekkaoen nnsen, amar a p aaqlen mara awven ar twacult nnsen, amar a d u$alen
Mi bbwven ar babat sen, nnan: "a babat nne$, igdel fella$ lkil, azen gmat nne$ yidne$, iwakken a d nektil. Nekwni, war ccekk, a neareb fellas
Inna: "day a kwen amne$ fellas, akken i kwen umne$, zik, $ef gma s? Oebbi Yif akw imearaben. Neppa Iphunu sennig akw ieninen

Mi ldin lqecc nnsen, ufan tu$al iten id selaa nnsen. Nnan: "a babat nne$, ur neb$i tagi, selaa nne$ tu$al a$ d. A d nessikrer i twacult nne$, a neareb $ef gmat nne$, a d nernu ppaabga n ul$wem. Tagi d ppaabga tushilt
Inna: "ur t sedduye$ yidwen, d awez$i, siwa ma tcubkem iyi s Oebbi, ard a yi t id terrem, siwa ma zzin awen". Mi s aahden, inna: "Oebbi d Awkil $ef wayen id nenna
Inna: "a tarwa, ur keccmet si yiwet n tebburt, kecmet si tebbura imgarraden. Ula i wen xedme$, bippa, ar loiha n Oebbi. Aeuddu siwa win n Oebbi. FellaS ppekle$, fellaS ay ppeklen wid ippkalen

Mi kecmen akken i sen iumeo babat sen, ula i sen ixdem, bippa, ar loiha n Oebbi. D ayen ilezmen kan i iseyya Yaqub, deg iman is. Neppa, s tidep, isaa tamusni i s Nesselmed, maca tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
Mi kecmen ar Yusef, ibbwi gma s $uoes, inna: "nekkini d gma k, ur $webbel $ef wayen xeddmen
Mi sen ifka ppaabgat nnsen, irra taqbuct deg ucekkao n gma s. Sinna, iberree uberrae: "a yat terkaf, kunwi, war ccekk, d imakwaren
Nnan, u zzin $uosen: "d acu tesoueem
Nnan: "nesoue taqbuct ugellid. Win ip id ibbwin, ad as nefk ppaabga n ul$wem. Nek, vemne$ t
Nnan: "s Oebbi, nni$ teeoam ur d nusa ara a nessefsed tamurt, ur nelli d imakwaren
Nnan: "d acu ay d aqeiii s, ma teskadbem
Nnan: " aqeiii n win i p ibbwin di tcekkaot is, d yiman is. Akka ay nepkafi imednas

Ibda la ipqellib icekkaoen, uqbel win n gma s, sinna, issuffe$ ip id seg ucekkao n gma s. Akka ay Nefka ticeokep i Yusef. Ur izmir ad iiief gma s, s lqanun ugellid, siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Nessalay, tiseddaoin, win i £ihwan. Sennig bu tussna, illa Umusnaw
Nnan: "ma iuker, ni$ iuker, zik, yiwen n watma s". Iffer ip Yusef $uoes, ur asen p id inna ara. Inna: "aql akwen deg yir eala. Oebbi Yif akw akken Ieoa ayen d teqqaoem
Nnan: "a yameqwoan, baba s, s tidep, wesser. Eiief yiwen segne$ deg umekkan is. Nwala k, ih, telliv si lauuam
Inna: "ur a$ Iaammed Oebbi a neiief, siwa win u$uo nufa ta$awsa nne$. Mulac, war ccekk, a nili d imednas

Mi uysen segs, mcawaoen, inna umeqwoan segsen: "day ur teeoim ara, ar babat wen tcubkem t s Oebbi, u, zik, tveggaam Yusef? Ihi, ur poueu$ si tmurt a, d awez$i, alamma iserree iyi baba, ne$ Ifra Oebbi felli. Neppa, Yif akw imeaddan
U$alet ar babat wen, tinem as: a babat nne$, mmi k, s tidep, iuker. Ncehhed kan $ef wayen neeoa, ur nessawev i tbavnit
Steqsi tamdint ideg i nella, akked terkift ukud nedda. Ih, d tidep, ay d nenna
Inna: "xaii! Lameo seg iman nnwen. Ilha uubeo. Amar Oebbi a yi ten id Iawi akw. Neppa, s tidep, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ijuneb iten, u inna: "a leif iw $ef Yusef"! Allen is ijegger itent u$ilif, innu$ben
Nnan: "s Oebbi, tezgiv tesmektayev d Yusef, alamma tu$alev d amuvin, ne$ seg wid immuten
Inna: "la pcetki$ kan i Oebbi, s uneemi w akked u$wbel iw. Ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
A yarraw iw, oueet, steqsit $ef Yusef akked gma s. Ur ppayset di tecvai n Oebbi. Ih, i ippaysen di tecvai n Oebbi, siwa agdud ijehliyen
Mi bbwven $uoes, nnan as: "a yameqwoan, nekwni akked twacult nne$, nepwa$. Nusa d s selaa oxisen, semd as lkil, seddeq a$. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipkafi wid ipseddiqen
Inna: "teeoam i tgam i Yusef akked gma s, mi kunwi, d wid ur nessin
Nnan: "kecc, s tidep, macci d Yusef "? Inna: "nek d Yusef, atan gma. Ni$ I$at a$ Oebbi. Ih, wid ipeezziben, wid iuebboen ... Oebbi, s tidep, ur Isoueu arraz iaaoviyen
Nnan: "s Oebbi ar k Ismenyaf Oebbi garane$. Nekwni, s tidep, neccev
Inna: "ur telli tiyta degwen, assa. Ad awen Isemmee Oebbi! Neppa Yif akw wid ipeunun
Awit tasedrit iw agi, erret ep $ef udem n baba, ad ielu yieoi s. Aset ed $uoi, s twacult nnwen, meooa
Mi teqlaa terkift, babat sen ibda la iqqao: "nek, s tidep, sraee$ rriea n Yusef, awi d kan ur teqqaoem ara: la isxeowiv
Nnan: "s Oebbi, ar k mazal di ttelfan ik n zik
Mi d iusa ubcir, issers as p $ef udem is, llint ed wallen is, inna: "day ur awen nni$ ara: nek ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Nnan as: "a babat nne$, ssuter ad a$ pwasemmeen ibekkaven nne$. S tidep, nella d imednab
Inna: "deqqal ad ssutre$, i Mass iw, ad awen Isemmee. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Mi bbwven ar Yusef, isteoeeb s imawlan is. Inna: "kecmet ar Maseo, di laman, ma Irad Oebbi

Issuli imawlan is ar usgeld. £lin, knan as. Inna: "a baba! D wagi ay d asefru n targit iw, n zik. Ni$ Issuffe$ ip Mass iw! Ni$ Iga yi leqoao mi yi d Issuffe$ si leebs. Ikkes ikwen id si sseeoa, deffir tismin i isker Cciian, gari d watma. Mass iw, s tidep, d Laiif i win i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
A Mass iw, ni$ Tefkiv iyi si tgelda, Teseefvev iyi asefru n temsal. Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, Kecc, d Bab iw di ddunit, di laxeot, Eddem ooue iw d amvua, Ssiwev iyi ar wid imaanen
Tagi, si teekayin n tbavnit, Nweeea yak p in. Ur telliv $uosen, mi mwafaqen a p andin
Tegwti n yimdanen, xas taapbev, ur ppamnen
Ur asen ssutur kra n teqdiat. Neppa, d asmekti kan i imavalen
I illan deg issekniyen di tmurt akked igenwan! La teddun fellasen, maca wexxoen asen
Tegwti, segsen, ur ppamnen s Oebbi, siwa ma curken
Day ppeklen ur asen isburru yara uaaqeb n Oebbi, ne$ ur ten id ippas ara yimir, deqzalla, ur pfaqan
Ini: "wagi d abrid iw, la pnuju$ ar Oebbi ad Ildi allen, i nek akked wid iddan yidi. Gedha s Oebbi! Ur lli$ seg wid ipcaraken

Nuzen ed kan, uqbel ik, irgazen seg imezda$ n temdinin, iwumi Nweeea. Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren? Ih, pifxio axxam aneggaru i wid ipeezziben. Day ur tefhimem ara
Alamma, mi uysen imazanen, u meyyzen ar skaddben ten, tusa ten id tallalt s$uone£. Nepsellik win i £ ihwan. Ur ipwakkas ara ssxev nne£, i ugdud ibe$wviyen
Ni$, di teekayin nnsen, illa uselmed i yuaqilen. Ur telli d awal id innulfan. Neppat tetebbet ed ay d izwaren, tfeuuel ed yal cci. D nnhaya u d aeunu i ugdud iumnen
Almo. Wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt. Ayen i k d irsen, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep, maca tegwti n medden ur ppamnen

Oebbi i Issulin igenwan war tigwejda ara twalim, sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld. Ieeppem i yiiij d waggur ad ddun, akw, ar lajel ipwassnen. Iseyyi lameo, Ipfeuuil issekniyen, amar a pepputebbtem $ef temlilit d Mass nnwen
Neppa i Isswesaen tamurt. Irra degs idurar, isaffen. Irra tayuga di yal ppemoa. Ip$ummu ass s yiv. Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i ugdud ipxemmimen
Di tmurt, tibeirin tioiratin, leonanat n teuoin, nnaama, tizdayin, v$an ne$ ur v$in, cerken aman nnsen. Nesmenyaf kra i kra, i wucci. Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i ugdud ifehmen
Ma twehmev, issewham ay d qqaoen: "ma nu$al d akal, day fella$, s tidep, lxelq amaynut"? D wigi i inekoen Mass nnsen. Wigi, azaglu $ef tmegoav. Wigi d at tmes, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen
Searen k ar tucmip, uqbel ise$. Ni$ voant am tigi, uqbel nnsen. Mass ik, s tidep, $uoeS ssmae i imdanen deg wayen ccven. Mass ik, s tidep, Iwaao deg uaaqeb
La qqaoen wid ijehlen: "a lemmer id irs $uoes ussekni, s$uo Mass is". Kecc, d aneddao kan. I yal agdud, win inehhun
Oebbi Ieoa i illan di yal tadist, amek teddun inzikmiren. Yal cci, $uoeS, s lmizan
Amusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. Ameqwoan, Aalayan
Iauva segwen win i$emven awal, d win it ibereen, win iffren deg iv, d win d ivehoen deg wass

Isaa iassasen zdat es, deffir es, pearaben fellas, s lameo n Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ipbeddil i illan deg ugdud, alamma bedlen i illan deg iman nnsen. Ma Irad Oebbi ayen n dir, i ugdud, ur t itekkes yiwen. Ur sain amaiwen, war Neppa
D Neppa i wen d Ippawin leboaq, degs tugdi, asirem. Isskar ed asigna aeayan
Tesbuccua aS termegt, s ccekoan, akken lmalayek, seg wakken ugadent eP. Ippazen ed ssiaqat, Ipeaz yisent win i S ihwan. Nitni pnamaren $ef Oebbi. Neppa teqsee tezmert iS
£uo Neppa, anuju n tidep. Wid u$uo la pnujun, war Neppa, ur asen d pparan s wacemma. Am win issendin ifassen i waman, ib$a ad awven s imi s, ur ibbwiv ar leb$i s. Anuju ijehliyen ar ttelfan kan
I Oebbi la kennun wid illan di tmurt akked igenwan, b$an ne$ ugin, akked tili nnsen, tauebeit, tameddit

Ini: "anwa ay d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Oebbi. Ihi day a pperrem d iebiben, war Neppa, wid ur nemlik, i yiman nnsen, aba$uo ne$ vveoo"? Ini: "day iaadel uder$al akked win ipwalin? Ne$, day aadlent tillas akked tafat? Ne$, rran imcurak i Oebbi, i ixelqen am lxelq iS, ufan t ippemcabi"? Ini: "d Oebbi i Ixelqen yal cci. D Neppa ay d Yiwen, d Aqehhao

Isse$lay ed aman, seg igenni. Serrun deg $ezoan, s leqdeo nnsen. Acercuo ippawi ikuftan ippifliwen. Ppemcabin ikuftan ar wayen fessin di tmes, iwakken ad uenaen ooeue ne$ dduzan. Akka ay d Isskan Oebbi tidep akked tkerkas. Ihi ikuftan ad ppuveggoen, ma d wayen inefaen medden, a d igwri di tmurt. Akka ay d Ippak Oebbi imedyaten
Lfayeq i wid ijawben i Mass nnsen. Wid ur aS njaweb ara, xas ad saun i illan akw di tmurt, berdayen, ur ten id ifeddu. I widak, leesab adiran. Axxam nnsen d Loahennama. A tanezdu$t tucmip
Day win ieoan ar ayen i k d irsen, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep, am win idre$len? Siwa uaqilen id ismektayen
Wid iiifen di laaqed n Oebbi, ur poueun nnesba
Wid issemlilen ayen id Iumeo Oebbi ad imlil, u ppagwaden Mass nnsen, u ppagwaden aqeiii adiran
Wid iueboen, ssaramen udem n Mass nnsen, bedden i teallit, pseddiqen seg wayen is iten N$at, s tuffra u ainani, swexxioen tucmip s yise$. I nitni, agwav s Axxam
Leonanat n Aaden ara kecmen, akked wid ixeddmen ayen ilhan, seg ibabaten nnsen, si tlawin nnsen, si tarwa nnsen. Lmalayek a d ppasent $uosen si yal tabburt
Tifrat fellawen, ilmend n wayen tueboem! D asaadi, wagwav s Axxam
Wid ipoueun laaqed n Oebbi, deffir lemwafaqa s, wid igezmen ayen d Iumeo Oebbi ad imlil, u ssefsaden di tmurt, wigi, i nitni xezzu, i nitni yir axxam
Oebbi Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen. Taaoeb iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Tameddurt n ddunit, d urar kan, zdat laxeot
La qqaoen wid ijehlen: "a lemmer id iris, $uoes, ussekni s$uo Mass is"! Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, Itellif win i S ihwan. Inehhu $uoeS, wid isteooiaen
wid iumnen, iwumi itheddin wul, mara d mmektin Oebbi". Ni$, s usmekti n Oebbi, pheddinen wulawen
Ssaad, akked taggara igerzen, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan
Akka ay k id Nuzen, i lois id zwaren leoyus, ad asen temlev, ayen ik d Nweeea. Nitni jehlen $uo Uenin. Ini: "Neppa d Mass iw, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa; ppekle$ fellaS, asteooaa iw $uoeS

A lemmer kan Leqwoan isselea idurar, iceqqeq tamurt, ne$ issenieq ed lmeggtin! Xaii! Lumuo akw i Oebbi. Day ur eoin ara wid iumnen, ar, ma ihwa yaS, Oebbi ad Inhu medden meooa? Zgan wid ijehlen a ten tewwet ssixia, ilmend n wayen xeddmen. Ne$ a ppevou ar tama n yixxamen nnsen, alamma tusa d lemaahda n Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ipzeggil ppaaud
Ni$ mmaalken, uqbel ik, deg imazanen. Ooi$ lmudda i wid ijehlen, sinna, Iife$ ten. A yaaaqeb iW imiren

Day Win Ibedden, ar yal amdan, $ef wayen ikseb…? Curken aS i Oebbi. Ini: "semmit asen! Ne$, ad aS temlem ayen ur Ieoi di tmurt? Ne$ d ismawen n tkerkas"? Xaii! Wid ijehlen, aaobent pen nncub nnsen. Ppuveoofen seg ubrid. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai w ara t inhun
Fellasen aaaqeb, di tmeddurt n ddunit. Aaaqeb n laxert, s tidep, aaer. Ur sain ara ten ifukken, seg ufus n Oebbi
Amek tga Loennet i ippuweaaden i wid ieezzben: ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen, lqut is akked tili s, d imezgiyen. D tagi ay d taggara n wid ieezzben. Taggara ijehliyen, d times
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, ad feoeen s wayen i k d irsen. Illa wayen ugin kra ikabaren. Ini: "pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Oebbi, ur aS pcarake$. Pnuju$ $uoeS, tu$alin iw $uoeS
Akka ay t id Nessers, d uuwab, s taaoabt. Ma teddiv d lhawiyya nnsen, deffir tisin n tussna $uoek, ur k ipfukku bab ne$ asettao, seg ufus n Oebbi
Ni$ Nuzen ed imazanen, uqbel ik, Nefka yasen tilawin, tarwa. Ur ippunefk ara i umazan a d iawi assekni siwa ma Iaammed Oebbi. Yal lajel s Tezmamt is
Iseffev u Itebbit Oebbi ay S ihwan. £uoeS tayimmap n Tezmamt
Ama Nessken ak kra n wayen i sen Naahed, ama Neddem ooue ik, ay fellak kan d isallen, ay fella£ d aqeiii
Day ur walan ara Neppas ed ar tmurt, Nessenqas di leryaf is? Oebbi Ipseyyi; yiwen ur ipnamar aseyyi iS. Neppa, Ip$awal di leesab
Ni$ ppandin wid i ten id izwaren. Tieeoci, akw, ar Oebbi. Ieoa i ikseb yal iman. Ad eoen ijehliyen anwa ara iawven s Axxam
Qqaoen wid ijehlen: "ur telliv d amazan". Ini: "ad Iqadd Oebbi d Anagi gari yidwen, akked kra isaan tussna n Tazmamt
Alo. Tazmamt, Nessers ak p id, iwakken a ppessuff$ev imdanen si tillas ar tafat, s wannuf n Mass nnsen, s abrid n Wuzmir, Amaazuz
Oebbi ilan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. A ssxev ijehliyen, ilmend uaaqeb uqsie
i ismenyafen tameddurt n ddunit wala laxeot, i iswexxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi, u ssaramen t d uawij! Widak, atnan di ttelfan u$miq
Ur d Nuzen amazan, siwa s tmeslayt n ugdud is, iwakken ad asen ibeggen. Oebbi Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ih, ni$ Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£: "ssuffe$ agdud ik, si tillas ar tafat. Mmekti yas d ussan n Oebbi". Deg waya, war ccekk, d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren

Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi, mi kwen Isellek si lois n Feraun, i issuken fellawen lhemm uqsie. Zellun arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, s$uo Mass nnwen, d cedda tameqwoaeant
Mi d Inna Mass nnwen: "ma tesnemmrem, ih, ad awen Rnu$. Ma tjehlem, aaaqeb iW, war ccekk, ad iwaao
Inna Musa: "ma tjehlem, kunwi akked wid n tmurt meooa, ihi, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz

Day ur kwen id ibbwiv ara usali imezwura nnwen: agdud n Nue, Aad, Tamud, akked wid iten ivefoen? Ur ten issin yiwen, siwa Oebbi. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen. Rran ifassen nnsen s imawen nnsen, nnan: "S tidep, nejhel ayen i$ef d teppuceggaam. Ih, nekwni di ccekk imcebbwel, $ef wayen u$uo la $ tneccdem

Nnan imazanen nnsen: "day illa ccekk di Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan? Inecced ikwen id, iwakken ad awen Isemmee kra ibekkaven nnwen, a kwen Ioo ar lajel ipwassnen". Nnan: "kunwi, s tidep, d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Teb$am ad a$ tesiixxoem, seg wayen llan aabden imezwura nne$. Awit a$ d adabu n uuee

Nnan asen imazanen nnsen: "nekwni d imdanen kan, am kunwi, maca Oebbi Iteg ccan i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Ur a$ ippunefk ara ad awen d nawi adabu, siwa s wannuf n Oebbi. £ef Oebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin
Acu i $ iu$en, ur nepkal ara $ef Oebbi? Ni$ Imla ya$ iberdan nne$; neubeo, war ccekk, i lmerta i tesaaddam fella$. £ef Oebbi ara ppeklen, at letkal
Nnan wid ijehlen i imazanen nnsen: "war ccekk, a kwen nessuffe$ si tmurt nne$, ne$ a d tu$alem ar ddin nne$". Iweeea yasen d Mass nnsen: "s tidep, a Nesqucc imednas
d$a, war ccekk, a kwen Nerr d imezda$ n tmurt, deffir sen". Ayagi, i win ippagwaden tilin iW, ippagwaden aberri W
Ssarmen l$elb. Ixseo yal aqehhao amnafeq
Loahennama deffir es, ad ites aman iwexmiyen
Tissit d tije$wimin, ur izmir ad isseblaa. Tameppant a d teppas si yal tamnai, neppa ur ipmeppat. Deffir es aaaqeb uqsie
Amedya n wid ijehlen, ar Mass nnsen: igiten nnsen am i$i$den i$ef iedem wavu, ass n tbucivant. Ur d ppawin acemma, seg wayen kesben. D wagi ay d ttelfan u$miq
Day ur twalav ara, Oebbi Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep? Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Ikkes, a d Iawi lxelq amaynut
Ayagi, i Oebbi, ur illi d ayen izzenzafen

A d rsen akw zdat Oebbi. Ad inin uohifen i imzuxiyen: "s tidep, nella nedda yidwen, ma tzemrem ad a$ tsellkem kra, seg uaaqeb n Oebbi"? A d inin: "lemmer i $ Inha Oebbi, yili nwelleh ikwen. Iauva fella$, neemeq ne$ neubeo, ur a$ illi ssoan

Mi isuyya lameo, a d yini Cciian: "Oebbi, d uuee, Iweaad awen lemaahda n tidep. Weaade$ awen, $uoe$ kwen. Ur sai$ adabu fellawen, siwa anecced nnwen. Tu$em awal iw. Ur iyi plummut, lummet iman nnwen.
